description: Durable trekking trousers for adventures in the mountains and forest. Made using durable wind and water-resistant G-1000® fabric with a double layer over the rear and knees. Regular waist (mid waist) and regular fit with pre-shaped knees. Six practical pockets including a map pocket and an axe pocket. Equipped with knee pad pockets (an accessory). Raw-length leg endings that can be easily adapted for your own height.
name: Fjallraven Barents Pro Trousers - Mens
